fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check the data source connection and ensure it is properly configured.
   2. Verify that the required metrics are selected in the data source settings.
   3. If using an SAP BW data source, check if the DSOs (Dimensionally Stored Objects) associated with the CDS views have been activated.
   4. Restart the ABAP System Monitor service to refresh the cached information.
   5. If the problem persists, consider clearing the browser cache and restarting your system to ensure all caches are refreshed.
